title: Cara Delevingne looks elegantly chic at the launch party of her collaboration with Nasty Gal
text:
Advertisement

She has seen incredible success thanks to her modelling and fledgling acting career.

And Cara Delevingne couldn't keep her eyes off her girlfriend Ashley Benson as the happy couple attended the launch of her collaboration with Nasty Gal at The Box in London on Tuesday.

In a video taken by an onlooker and shared to Instagram, the model, 27, could be seen grinding up against the actress, 29, as they enjoyed the night together.

Supportive: Cara Delevingne was joined by girlfriend Ashley Benson at the launch party of the model's collaboration with Nasty Gal

As they partied the night away, Cara could be seen dancing seductively in front of her girlfriend as she sat in a separate booth.

Clearly enjoying the gesture, Ashley could be seen sticking her tongue out before smiling and sitting up further in the seating area.

Another clip saw Cara take a picture of her loved one, while later on she was seen taking hold of her hand as they walked through the party together.

Ashley was not seen entering the party with Cara, but the pair could hardly spend a moment without each other apart from each other.

Loved-up: As they partied the night away, Cara could be seen dancing seductively in front of her girlfriend Ashley Benson as she sat in a separate booth

Beaming: Clearly enjoying the gesture, Ashley could be seen sticking her tongue out before smiling and sitting up further in the seating area

Sweet: Another clip saw Cara take a picture of her loved one, while later on she was seen taking hold of her hand as they walked through the party together

Staying close: Ashley was not seen entering the party with Cara, but the pair could hardly spend a moment apart from each other

Stylish: Cara looked elegantly chic in a tailored suit and crop top as she arrived in style

Sultry: Ashley looked sensational in her black lace crop top and loose light-wash denim jeans

The beauty looked elegantly chic in a tailored blazer and flared trousers which had a chequered-print.

Cara showed off a hint of her toned abs by wearing a simple white crop top, while her trousers were cinched at the waist to accentuate her slender figure.

Boosting her height in a pair of black heels, she complemented her ensemble by keeping her personal items in a designer handbag.

The Carnival Row star's blonde locks were swept back into a slick style, while she used smokey eye shadow and bright red lipstick to highlight her pretty features.

Gorgeous: Ashley wore a sultry black lace crop top with denim jeans

Wow! Cara showed off a hint of her toned abs by wearing a simple white crop top, while her trousers were cinched at the waist to accentuate her slender figure

Pretty: The Carnival Row star's blonde locks were swept back into a slick style, while she used smokey eye shadow and bright red lipstick to highlight her pretty features

Style maven: Cara continued to match her look by wearing bright red nail polish

Low-key: Cara kept her head down as she walked through the streets of London

Heading inside: Cara walked briskly to the venue as she held up her hand to shield her eyes from the flashing cameras that greeted her

Beauty: Cara looked stunning in her chic attire as she chatted away

Meanwhile Lottie Moss put her sensational figure on display, as she dazzled in a daring mesh top and flares.

The 21-year-old model flashed underboob in her quirky long sleeved top which featured a mesh panel across the chest.

She teamed the garment with flared velvet tracksuit bottoms that skimmed over a pair of chunky silver platform heels.

Lottie accessorised with a black cross body bag and styled her glossy golden locks loose and poker straight.

Low-key exit: Cara and Ashley left together after the fun night out, but the actress covered her head with a black coat

Working it: Meanwhile Lottie Moss put her sensational figure on display, as she dazzled in a daring mesh top and flares

Top of the crops: Lottie flashed underboob in her quirky long sleeved top which featured a mesh panel across the chest. She teamed the garment with flared velvet tracksuit bottoms

Similar: Tigerlily Taylor appeared to match Lottie in a mesh top and loose trousers

Of working with the brand, Cara said: 'I couldn’t be more thrilled to star in Nasty Gal’s holiday campaign.

'I’ve followed the brand for years and am inspired by their approach to fashion – always rebellious and ever evolving.

'I love to work with brands that push the envelope on style and this collection does just that,' she added.

On the decks: Daisy Lowe and her best pal Nick Grimshaw were on hand to DJ the event

Animated: The pals couldn't help but giggle as they were in each others company

Plunging: Ashley Roberts showed off a glimpse of her cleavage in an asymmetrical dress

LBD: Ashley James kept things simple in a lace-trim black dress which had a caged bodice

Cara also spoke of her desire to ensure every person 'feels empowered', as she explained: 'I think it is very important that everyone feels empowered – man or woman.

'I’ve always tried to embrace and promote messages of uniqueness and individuality.'

Her and Ashley's outing comes after Cara praised her girlfriend for making her feel like the 'luckiest girl in the world'.

Speaking at the 2019 Girl Up #GirlHero Awards in Los Angeles on Sunday, Cara gushed: 'It's so nice to have someone in my life that supports me so much and loves me. I'm the luckiest girl in the world.'

Snap! Lucy Watson matched Cara's girlfriend as she wore the same crop top and PVC trousers

Revealing: Ella Eyre wore a sheer black top that showed off her lace lingerie

Glamour: Ella accessorised with an array of gold necklaces that offset her black ensemble

Turning heads: Talia Storm was sure to grab attention with her striking dress which had a plunging neckline and dramatic puffy detailing

Ashley and Cara's romance has gone from strength to strength since they first started dating in May 2018.

Cara recently spoke to Porter, the digital edition of Net-A-Porter, about why her bond with Ashley is different from her previous relationships.

'I’d never truly let anyone in before, for fear of them leaving. I never really trusted people, or felt worthy of it, and I always pushed them away,' shared Cara.

Flower power: Brooklyn Beckham's rumoured girlfriend Phoebe Torrance wore a black dress with a floral print

Loved-up: Couple Delilah Belle Hamlin and Eyal Booker were also in attendance at the event

Legs for days! Louisa Johnson paired an oversized white shirt with black boots

Glamorous: Lottie Tomlinson wore a PVC-style black mini dress which had flared sleeves

The model and actress said of Ashley: 'She’s the first person that has said: "You can’t push me away. I’m going to be nice to you, I love you."'

Cara recalled: 'I’m just like, wait, so all I have to do is just let you be nice to me? Why have I never done that before? OK.'

Although Ashley lives in Los Angeles and Cara's Amazon Prime show Carnival Row is shot in Prague, they have managed to keep the romance afloat.

'Long-distance relationships are always tough. We make it work, though. We have to. And it definitely makes me a better, happier person,' she said.

Chic: Game Of Thrones star Laura Pradelska wore a black dress with a daring side split to show off her slender legs

Ethereal: Emma Louise Connolly looked stylish in a white blazer with a gold chain belt

Simple yet chic: Roxie Nafousi tucked in a white tank top into green flared trousers

Bright: Betsy-Blue English was sure to turn heads in her hot pink velvet co-ord suit

Clashing prints: Cassyette wore snakeskin trousers and had a zebra-print handbag

All that glitters: Sophia Hadjipanteli wore a sparkling silver turtleneck dress

Dotty: Felicity Hayward looked sensational in a monochrome polka-dot dress
description: The model, 27, was sure to turn heads as she made a stylish entrance at the launch of her collaboration with Nasty Gal at The Box in London on Tuesday.
